functions.description: Retrieve the price for the first item matching a search query given a store name
functions.name: GETINFOFROMURL

parameters.description: The URL of the product, from a known supermarket.
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: The (reference) quantity of the product, possibly with its units. Standard units apply. standard multipliers are denoted by square brackets.
parameters.name: refQuantity

parameters.description: The kind of the (reference) quantity. Valid values are: price-in-local-currency, count, mass, volume, protein-mass, energy.
parameters.name: refQuantityKind

parameters.description: The search query for the nutrition facts if they are not found after looking up with the item code.
parameters.name: nutritionFactsFallbackSearchQuery

parameters.description: The ratio of mass to count with its units. Standard units apply. standard multipliers are denoted by square brackets.
parameters.name: massToCountRatio

parameters.description: The ratio of mass to volume with its units. Standard units apply. standard multipliers are denoted by square brackets.
parameters.name: massToVolumeRatio

parameters.description: The information to retrieve, comma-separated, in order. Valid values are: price-in-local-currency-slc, count-id, mass-g, volume-L, protein-mass-g, energy-Cal.
parameters.name: infoToRetrieve
